name: Flushed Away
tagline: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

name: Field of Dreams
tagline: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the Chicago Black Sox come.

name: The Purge
tagline: In the future, a wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.

name: Miracle
tagline: Miracle tells the true story of Herb Brooks (Russell), the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Russian squad.

name: Jackass: The Movie
tagline: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.

name: The Amityville Horror
tagline: A family is terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a home that was the site of a grisly mass-murder.

name: The Nut Job
tagline: An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren raid a nut store to survive, that is also the front for a human gang's bank robbery.

name: Down to Earth
tagline: After dying before his time, an aspiring comic gets a second shot at life...by being reincarnated as a wealthy but un-likeable businessman.

name: 17 Again
tagline: About a guy whose life didn't quite turn out how he wanted it to and wishes he could go back to high school and change it. He wakes up one day and is seventeen again and gets the chance to rewrite his life.

name: Deja Vu
tagline: An A.T.F. agent travels back in time to save a woman from being murdered, falling in love with her in the process.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
tagline: Live-action adaptation of Jeff Kinney's illustrated novel about a wise-cracking sixth grade student.

name: Working Girl
tagline: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss's job.

name: Happy Feet Two
tagline: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

name: Sky High
tagline: Set in a world where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young Will Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

name: Last Vegas
tagline: Three sixty-something friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.

name: Scent of a Woman
tagline: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

name: Dirty Dancing
tagline: Spending the summer in a holiday camp with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle.

name: Life
tagline: The story of two criminals (Eddie Murphy and Martin Lawrence) who discover the value of life after being sentenced to life imprisonment.

name: In & Out
tagline: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

name: Staying Alive
tagline: It's five years later and Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenger yet - making it as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

name: The Witches of Eastwick
tagline: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted - at a cost - when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

name: What About Bob?
tagline: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, a highly manipulative obsessive-compulsive narcissist, tracks him down during his family vacation.

name: Mona Lisa Smile
tagline: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 50's Wellesley girls to question their traditional societal roles.

name: Unknown
tagline: Five men wake up in a locked-down warehouse with no memory of who they are. They are forced to figure out who is good and who is bad to stay alive.

name: Thunderball
tagline: James Bond heads to The Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

name: The Fifth Element
tagline: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.

name: Hope Springs
tagline: After thirty years of marriage, a middle-aged couple attends an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

name: Risky Business
tagline: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

name: A Fish Called Wanda
tagline: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

name: Miami Vice
tagline: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

name: The Time Traveler's Wife
tagline: A romantic drama about a Chicago librarian with a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, and the complications it creates for his marriage.

name: Tango & Cash
tagline: Two cops are framed and must clear their names.

name: She's All That
tagline: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

name: Dave
tagline: To avoid a potentially explosive scandal when the U.S. President goes into a coma, an affable temp agency owner with an uncanny resemblance, is put in his place.

name: Madea's Family Reunion
tagline: While planning her family reunion, a pistol-packing grandma (Perry) must contend with the other dramas on her plate, including the runaway who has been placed under her care, and her love-troubled nieces.

name: The Holiday
tagline: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
tagline: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlin's descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana le Fey.

name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
tagline: The dimwitted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
tagline: A re-imagining of the horror icon Freddy Krueger, a serial-killer who wields a glove with four blades embedded in the fingers and kills people in their dreams, resulting in their real death in reality.

name: The Last Song
tagline: A drama centered on a rebellious girl who is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

name: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
tagline: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaii vacation in order to deal with recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex ... and she's bringing along her new boyfriend.

name: Moonraker
tagline: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

name: Jarhead
tagline: Based on former Marine Anthony Swofford's best-selling 2003 book about his pre-Desert Storm experiences in Saudi Arabia and about his experiences fighting in Kuwait.

name: The Crying Game
tagline: A British soldier is kidnapped by IRA terrorists. He befriends one of his captors, who is drawn into the soldier's world.

name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
tagline: Alabama teenager Sean Boswell becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

name: The Adjustment Bureau
tagline: The affair between a politician and a ballerina is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

name: Underworld: Awakening
tagline: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.

name: Underworld: Evolution
tagline: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selena and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

name: For Your Eyes Only
tagline: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

name: Bewitched
tagline: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic show "Bewitched".

name: Down and Out in Beverly Hills
tagline: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

name: The Wolfman
tagline: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.

name: Mousehunt
tagline: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

name: Ender's Game
tagline: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, a genocidal alien race which nearly annihilated the human race in a previous invasion.

name: Cinderella Man
tagline: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

name: Flatliners
tagline: Medical students bring themselves near death; their experiment begins to go awry.

name: The Goonies
tagline: A group of kids set out on an adventure in search of pirate treasure that could save their homes from foreclosure.

name: National Lampoon's Vacation
tagline: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

name: Rules of Engagement

production.name: Munich Film Partners & Company (MFP) ROE Production

tagline: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.

name: The Cell
tagline: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

name: Misery
tagline: A famous novelist is "rescued" from a car crash by an obsessed fan.

name: Friday Night Lights
tagline: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

name: The Shaggy Dog
tagline: A man tries to live a normal life despite the fact that he sometimes turns into a sheepdog.

name: Unknown
tagline: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.

name: The Devil's Advocate
tagline: A hotshot lawyer gets more than he bargained for when he learns his new boss is Lucifer himself.

name: Prisoners
tagline: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?

name: Get Him to the Greek
tagline: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

name: Mission to Mars
tagline: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

name: Coyote Ugly
tagline: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

name: Poseidon
tagline: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner, Poseidon, capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for survival as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

name: Three Kings
tagline: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, 4 soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

name: Jingle All the Way
tagline: A father decides to dream the impossible; to get a Turbo Man action figure for his son just before Christmas.

name: After Earth
tagline: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

name: Fantasia/2000
tagline: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

name: Kiss the Girls
tagline: Police hunting for a serial killer are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

name: Shanghai Knights
tagline: When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.

name: The Lucky One
tagline: A Marine travels to Louisiana after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.

name: The Wedding Planner

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

tagline: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

name: Burn After Reading
tagline: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it.

name: Scrooged
tagline: A cynically selfish TV executive gets haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

name: Baby Mama
tagline: A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.

name: The Cable Guy
tagline: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

name: Resident Evil: Afterlife
tagline: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors who want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

name: Spies Like Us
tagline: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

name: Why Did I Get Married Too?
tagline: Four couples find themselves struggling to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.

name: Bad Santa
tagline: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid, and the security boss discovers the plot.

name: Species
tagline: A message from outer space contains instructions on how to modify human DNA.

name: Hope Floats
tagline: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

name: Tooth Fairy
tagline: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

name: Snow Day
tagline: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

name: Superman III
tagline: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

name: Brüno
tagline: Flamboyant Austrian fashionista Brüno takes his show to America.

name: Jungle 2 Jungle
tagline: A New Yorker suddenly learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who's been raised in the jungle. He brings the boy to New York city, and that's where the fun starts.

name: The Good Shepherd
tagline: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

name: The Cannonball Run
tagline: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country car race.
